A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I can only conclude that Disney PURPOSEFULLY wanted to destroy their own franchise. They KNOWINGLY hired a terrible director; DELIBERATELY had awful jokes. As a fan\, I  just really have to choke on the years of blood\, sweat and tears that went into Star Wars and now all for nothing. Disney has created a child-like universe where everything is carrot and nothing is stick. DIE DISNEY DIE!
